commit message: Initial commit: Network stack, schedule parser, database layer, search suggestion content provider.

- Added MapFragment with zoomable map thanks to PhotoView.
- Added directions to ULB menu option in MapFragment.
Added main menu in drawerLayout + code to switch between sections.
Enabled Proguard

Updated DB queries of methods returning a cursor to rename the rowid
column as '_id' for the CursorAdapter.
Added simple persons list.
Implement fast scroll in persons list using AlphabetIndexer

Added Tracks list and included PagerSlidingTabStrip code as tab
indicator to select the day.
Added cache for Days list in DatabaseManager and send a broadcast when
the schedule has been downloaded.

Properly save and restore ViewPager state by setting the adapter after
the data is loaded

Added code to allow any section fragment to be either added/removed or
attached/detached.
Tracks fragment is attached/detached by default.

Added last updated date in the bottom of the main menu.
Made the menu slightly translucent.
Ensure the selected menu item is visible when changing orientation.
Added database update reminder dialog.

Added TrackScheduleActivity and TrackScheduleFragment
Fixed EventsParser: cannot recycle the ArrayList of persons and links
because IterablePullParser uses 2 instances of Event simultaneously.

Added code to also bypass hostname verification in HttpUtils (required
for HTTPS redirects)

Added EventDetailsFragment and Activity
Renamed AbstractAsyncTaskLoader to LocalCacheLoader

Updated fosdem purple colors & applied the colors to
PagerSlidingTabStrip

Added event sharing and code to retrieve the FOSDEM year from the
database.
Added code to add event to the user's calendar

Added default styles for listview selection color and textView link
color

Added PersonInfoListFragment and activity
Fine-tuned dimensions and added more of them in dimens.xml
Added add/remove bookmarks and bookmarks list
Added SearchResultListFragment in SearchResultActivity.

Implemented details display on search suggestion click and global system
search support.

Add TrackScheduleEventActivity, a specialized activity to show events
related to the same track in a ViewPager (with an
UnderlinePageIndicator).

Added big central indeterminate progressbar while loading cursor in
TrackScheduleEventActivity
Implemented dual-pane display mode for TrackScheduleActivity.
Added 'upcoming only' filter in bookmarks list.
Changed target SDK version to 19 (Android 4.4)
Switch to current year's database URL
Improved String-to-Slug transformation code
Save and restore the current query text in SearchResultActivity.
Implement proper up navigation from Event Details to Track.
Changed scale mode of the map image to fitCenter
Fixed keypad navigation in event details fragment
FOSDEM theme implementation
Improved keypad navigation when opening main menu
Improved readability in SearchSuggestionProvider

Database internal updates:
- Bookmarks are now retrieved with a min startTime
- Events are broadcast when a bookmark is added/removed
- Multiple bookmarks can now be deleted at the same time (for future
use)

Added notifications system and settings screen.
+ Sorted strings

Added custom animation when opening settings menu.
Added settings icon and show it if there's room.

Updated loader in BookmarksListFragment so that bookmarks are
automatically refreshed when the list is limited to future bookmarks and
the start time of the first bookmark is reached.
Display the Building name next to the room name in event details

Changed event id and person id to long type instead of int.
Only broadcast bookmark added/removed on success.
Fix: scroll position lost because of textIsSelectable attribute on title
Fixed removeBookmarks when passing multiple ids

Added MultiChoiceModeListener on bookmarks list, to be able to delete
multiple bookmarks at once.
Fixed settings animation resources
Added Lameere room in building finder

Made MessageDialogFragment more generic: accepts CharSequences and not
just Strings

Added room images. They can be shown by clicking on the room name in
EventDetailsFragment. (+500KB apk file size)

Notifications display change: show room name in the bottom right corner
below the time, and show the track name first in subtitle before the
speakers.
Added about dialog.

Remove custom sort order when retrieving the list of persons related to
an event to ensure the order is the same as in persons summary text.
Sort tracks by name in the tracks list

- Simplified the schedule download code by using an AsyncTask, a simple
ReentrantLock and local broadcasts instead of a loader and a complex
lock.
- Download error reporting is now done using a Toast instead of a
Broadcast.
- Database cache is now only cleared when the DB transaction is
successful.
Removed outdated doc

Added 'Live' section to show upcoming and currently running events,
refreshed every minute.
In this section, EventsAdapter shows the event start time and end time
instead of its day and start time.
Preparing manifest for release version 1.0.1
Changed build target to API 19 (KitKat)
Add licence
Create README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md

Fixed crash when creating the options menu on some Android versions:
menu was created before the event was loaded. (Reported by Simon
Debaeke)
Improved bookmark status refresh in EventDetailsFragment
Ensure menu data is loaded before calling setHasOptionsMenu()
Replaced legacy search with SearchView in ActionBar for API level 8+
Updated manifest for release 1.0.2
Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:cbeyls/fosdem-companion-android.git
Handle events with no speakers (Issue reported by B. Leseul)
Improved text display in About dialog.

Fragments option menus: keep a reference to MenuItems to change their
state directly instead of recreating the whole menu (works fine with
ActionBarCompat)

Replaced share ActionProvider with simple chooser Intent to ensure
compatibility with 4.0.3 and make more room for the bookmark icon.

Fixed problem during menu creation in TrackScheduleEventActivity in
Android 4.0.x
Updated legal info.
updated legal info in README
Update to new room naming system

Only broadcast the event id and start time instead of the full event
when adding a bookmark.
Updating manifest for release 1.0.3
Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:cbeyls/fosdem-companion-android.git

Added purple-colored indeterminate horizontal progress bar style, in
addition to the determined style.

Fix: properly restore the ViewPager position when
TrackScheduleEventActivity is restored.

Load bookmark status asynchronously using a loader to ensure the UI
thread is not blocked when the database is updating. The loader is
notified of bookmarks status changes to deliver the new status
immediately.
Converted forgotten integer reference to Event id to long.
Display a star icon to the right of starred events in lists.

Use BigText-styled notifications to show a bit more information in
expanded state.
Update manifest for release 1.0.4

Display both start and end time in events list (including bookmarks),
along with a shorter representation of the day name.

Make parser date format non-static to avoid cross-thread issues
(even if only one parser is effectively working at the same time with
the current code)

Check start time and end time existence when creating the intent to add
an event to the system calendar.

Improved notifications with an action button allowing to show the room
map image directly.
Event subtitle in notification BigText style is now shown in white,
before the speaker(s).
Updated campus map to new version with paths and facilities.
Updated manifest for release 1.0.5

Added Gradle Build script.
Ensure Lint checks pass for Gradle build.
Use DateUtils.withBelgiumTimeZone utility method in Day.java too
Updated build instructions for Gradle

Fixed search view gaining focus when going back to SearchResultActivity
in pre-ICS ActionBar.

Scroll to the source event in TrackScheduleListFragment when navigating
up from EventDetailsActivity. Also select the source event by default in
dual-pane mode.

Added Android Beam support to allow sharing sessions using NFC, in all
activities showing sessions.
Made date format final in Day

Events in progress are now displayed with a contrasted background color
for the time column in TrackScheduleListFragment.
Updated campus map to the latest version
Preparing manifest for release 1.0.6
Fix: inverted two colors.
Updating manifest for release 1.0.7

Fixed ListView padding in PersonInfoListFragment, by also overriding
setClipToPadding and setScrollBarStyle.
Allow the app to be installed on external storage.

Fix: properly reuse the startup fragment in MainActivity after is has
been detached by setting its tag.

Replaced PagerSlidingTabStrip with a slightly improved version of
Android's example SlidingTabLayout.
Added xxxhdpi app icon
Added purple-styled checkbox and fast scroll thumb in Holo theme.
Make ListView inherit from Holo ListView style on Android 11+.

Removed obsolete @SuppressWarnings annotations in
UnderlinePageIndicator.
Purge outdated bookmarks after downloading the new database.
Migrate to android support r20 and build tools v20

Don't clear the database when the downloaded file contains zero events.
Properly notify according to the number of events downloaded.
Optimized notifications for wearables and Android 5.
Added a subtle drop shadow to the app icon.
Updating manifest file for release 1.0.8
Migrated project structure to Android Studio
Improved .gitignore rules
Enforce correct resource types with annotations.
Migrate sources to Java 1.7 compatibility: use switch on Strings and diamond operators for improved readability/performance.
Small improvements following automatic code analysis
Improve SearchView auto close in MainActivity.
Updated manifest for release 1.1.0 (latest stable release before design upgrade)
First batch of Material Design with complete new themes, styles and ActionBar drawables.
Downgrade to PhotoView 1.2.2 because 1.2.3 crashes when zooming out.

Fixed UnderlinePageIndicator display.
Put it on top of the content to prevent displaying a thin white line at the bottom of the screen.

Fixed drawable padding in schedule item layout
(now 8dp like in event item layout)

Use primary color instead of accent color for event details metadata background.
This area will need more tweaks before final release.

List fragments now inherit from SmoothListFragment
for simpler code and more smoothness under Lollipop.

Updated main app icon shadow
15px omnidirectional 90% black

Added proper small notification icon
respecting the OS guidelines.
Updated manifest for hotfix release 1.1.1.

Merge branch 'master' into material

Conflicts:
app/build.gradle
app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml

Set notification color & category
(Lollipop specific)
Use FOSDEM colors for dialogs and AlertDialogs under Material theme.
New sliding tabs implementation for Material Design
Fix: main progress now properly uses the Material style on Android 5.
Make DialogTheme inherit from the new AppCompat dialog theme to simplify styles.
Restored: emulate allCaps for API<14 in SlidingTabLayout

Added extended title Toolbar for PersonInfoActivity
+ Fixed toolbar elevation value.

- Make tabs in SlidingTabLayout focusable for keyboard input
- Use the Support Library's selectableItemBackground instead of the platform one to allow selectable backgrounds on API<14.
Removed unnecessary titles and use the same titles for TrackScheduleActivity and TrackScheduleEventActivity
New styles for headers and metadata in event details.
Added support for direct search from Google Now
Merge branch 'master' into material
Fix: properly clear the links container view with the new layout in EventDetailsFragment.
New dual-pane tablet layout featuring extended height Toolbar and CardView.
Fix: Remove the EventDetailsFragment from the FragmentManager after switching from dual pane to single pane mode to prevent its ActionBar icons from showing up.
Merge branch 'master' into material
Added Floating Action Button in dual-pane layout of TrackScheduleActivity
Disable compatibility Floating Action Button selector transition animation to avoid background crossfading issue.
Reduced the right margin of dual pane tablet layout to 96dp.
Use slightly darker separator line color
Tweak track_schedule layout in tablet landscape mode to increase card elevation and compensate for the compatibility padding.
Move 'Settings' and 'About' from options menu to main menu footer.
Update manifest file for next hotfix release.
Updated campus map to 2015 edition.
Improve readability of up navigation code in EventDetailsActivity and add missing flags in the Manifest file for it.
Added warning message instead of crash when no compatible calendar app is found.
Removed restriction to only use Google Maps for directions if installed, allowing to use third-party apps or a browser.

Added Http cache awareness
to skip updating the database when the remote file has not changed.
Update Gradle plugin to 1.1
README
fosdem -> GLT
refactoring
rooms, location plan
strings
german translation, version 1.0.0
Track labels, german translation
translation, type info on events
glt --> companion
companion as package name
companion in README
